description: Welcome to the sought after WINSTON GARDEN at Richmond city centre. Only 9 years old, this quality built & well kept CORNER UNIT features 9FT CEILING, crown mouldings & open layout w/ 3 bedrooms, 3 baths & a potential 4th bedroom at the flex area with closet & window. Abundance of natural light from over-sized windows, window seats, & extra windows at stairway. Laminated flooring throughout & gourmet kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances, GAS stove, QUARTZ countertops & kitchen island w/ extra seating. Spacious garage & tons of street parking. Desirable Palmer Secondary & Garden City Elementary schools. Convenient central location: 5-minute walk to Garden City Shopping Centre, 5-minute drive to Richmond Ctr/Brighouse Skytrain w/ easy access to Vancouver. Incredible Value and Move-In Ready!
